snippet: The mysterious death of an American philanthropist has cast a spotlight on the source of her husband’s vast wealth: the stackable, light and ubiquitous drink box.
lead_paragraph: The mysterious death of an American philanthropist has cast a spotlight on the source of her husband’s vast wealth: the stackable, light and ubiquitous drink box.

headline.seo: Tetra Pak, a Fortune Founded on a Clever Idea
headline.main: Tetra Pak, a Fortune Founded on a Clever Idea
headline.print_headline: Tetra Pak, a Fortune Founded on a Clever Idea
